About Me

Welcome to my Github Page!

My name is Yuxuan Wang (王育瑄). Feel free to call me Allen, or El15ande.

I graduated from University of St Andrews with a Master degree in Computer Science, and I worked in many roles before: Frontend developer (React/Vue, Flutter), Cloud Networking Support & Operation engineer, and Project Manager. In part-time, I am also an experienced CompSci tutor for beginner students at any age.

Now, I am a Custom Success Engineer at Tencent RTC, aiming to become a Cloud Solution Architect, an experienced Technical Writer, and a Husband in the near future!
